src:
FOTO: Seni Instalasi Mengenang 30 Tahun Tembok Berlin
04 Nov 2019, 00:45 by AFP, AP,, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Sebuah instalasi seni dibuat untuk mengenang 30 tahun runtuhnya tembok Berlin di Jerman.


Tembok Berlin runtuh sekitar 30 tahun lalu. Di hari ini runtuhnya tembok Berlin dirayakan di Jerman. (AP Photo/Markus Schreiber)



Para pekerja telah mengangkat jaring berwarna pelangi dari 100.000 pita - banyak dengan pesan cinta dan perdamaian. (Tobias SCHWARZ / AFP)



Perayaan dilakukan di Gerbang Brandenburg yang ikonis di Berlin sebagai bagian dari peringatan 30 tahun jatuhnya Tembok Berlin.  (John MACDOUGALL / AFP)



Instalasi, yang disebut "Visions in Motion," adalah karya seniman Los Angeles Patrick Shearn, yang telah membuat patung bergerak serupa di tempat lain di dunia. (Tobias SCHWARZ / AFP)



Shearn mengatakan kepada The Associated Press pada hari Jumat bahwa ia ingin menyampaikan rasa dunia yang dinamis dengan merangkai kain pelapis nilon nilon ripstop seluas 20.000 kaki persegi.  (AP Photo/Markus Schreiber)



Dia berharap itu akan mencerminkan keinginan luas untuk perdamaian. (AP Photo/Markus Schreiber)



Di antara 30.000 catatan tulisan tangan adalah pesan-pesan seperti "Cinta menang," Revolusi  (Tobias SCHWARZ / AFP)



Selain itu ada juga tulisan "Saya harap dinding di kepala (orang) hilang juga. " (Tobias SCHWARZ / AFP)
text:
PHOTO: Installation Art Commemorating 30 Years of the Berlin Wall
04 Nov 2019, 00:45 by AFP, AP ,, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - An art installation created to commemorate 30 years of the fall of the Berlin wall in Germany.


The Berlin Wall fell about 30 years ago. On this day the collapse of the Berlin wall is celebrated in Germany. (AP Photo / Markus Schreiber)



Workers have raised rainbow-colored webs of 100,000 ribbons - many with messages of love and peace. (Tobias SCHWARZ / AFP)



The celebration took place at the iconic Brandenburg Gate in Berlin as part of the 30th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall. (John MACDOUGALL / AFP)



The installation, called "Visions in Motion," is the work of Los Angeles artist Patrick Shearn, who has made similar moving sculptures elsewhere in the world. (Tobias SCHWARZ / AFP)



Shearn told The Associated Press on Friday that he wanted to convey a sense of the dynamic world by assembling a ripstop nylon upholstery fabric covering 20,000 square feet. (AP Photo / Markus Schreiber)



He hopes it will reflect a broad desire for peace. (AP Photo / Markus Schreiber)



Among the 30,000 handwritten notes are messages such as "Love wins," Revolution (Tobias SCHWARZ / AFP)



In addition there is also an inscription "I hope the wall on the head (of people) disappears too." (Tobias SCHWARZ / AFP)
